problems.title: Overheating / Shuts Off
problems.description: The vacuum turns off after 10 minutes and feels hot.
possible_causes: Bag is overfilled and blocking airflow
solution_steps: Change the Super Air Clean filter (the white pad).
Wait 30 minutes for the thermal cutout to reset.

problems.title: Canister Lid Won't Close
problems.description: The dust compartment cover pops open or won't click shut.
solution_steps: Ensure the bag collar is slid fully into the guide.
Check if the plastic bag holder hinge is snapped (common issue).
